description: Turn Master is a fun way of randomly selecting one or more people from the group of people that you have told it about.  Start by adding the names of the people in the group and then ask Turn Master to select someone. Turn Master can be repeatedly asked to select someone until there are no more selections that can be made. Selections can be removed as can individuals from the group.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Turn Master to add John
Alexa ask Turn Master to choose someone
name: Turn Master
shortDescription: Choose one or more people from your group.
